page.title: 14AGDEN BROOK FARM CONT/D.
page.content: The Cows are milked by a milking Parlor,it takes 20 cows at a time,10 cows on each side.The milk is bought by the Milk Marketing Board.The cows slept in cubicals in large sheds in the winter. The other thing the farmer grows are Potatoes which are stored in sheds.The Farmer has two sheds, one of which holds 500 tons of potatoes and the other 250 tons.The whiter the potatoes the better they are.They are sold to Golden Wonder. The best Quality of potatoe land is by the farmhouse.The farmer can pick about 13-14 tons of potatoes each day.The machine that collects the potatoes is called a potatoe harvester, it only collects the big ones and leaves the little ones behind.6 people work on the machine.
